'queryContext => new SingleQueryingEnumerable<Event>(
    (RelationalQueryContext)queryContext, 
    RelationalCommandCache.QueryExpression(
        Client Projections:
            0 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: Event.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 0], [Property: Event.Date (DateTime) Required, 1], [Property: Event.Location (string) Required MaxLength(50), 2], [Property: Event.Name (string) Required MaxLength(50), 3] }
            1 -> 0
            2 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: Attendance.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 4], [Property: Attendance.EventId (int) Required FK Index, 5], [Property: Attendance.IsAttending (bool) Required, 6], [Property: Attendance.UserId (int) Required FK Index, 7] }
            3 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: User.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 8], [Property: User.Email (string) Required MaxLength(50), 9], [Property: User.Password (string) Required MaxLength(50), 10], [Property: User.Role (string) Required MaxLength(50), 11], [Property: User.Username (string) Required MaxLength(50), 12] }
            4 -> 4
            5 -> 8
        SELECT t.Id, t.Date, t.Location, t.Name, t0.Id, t0.EventId, t0.IsAttending, t0.UserId, t0.Id0, t0.Email, t0.Password, t0.Role, t0.Username
        FROM 
        (
            SELECT e.Id, e.Date, e.Location, e.Name
            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Id ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        LEFT JOIN 
        (
            SELECT a.Id, a.EventId, a.IsAttending, a.UserId, u.Id AS Id0, u.Email, u.Password, u.Role, u.Username
            FROM Attendances AS a
            INNER JOIN Users AS u ON a.UserId == u.Id
        ) AS t0 ON t.Id == t0.EventId
        ORDER BY t.Id ASC, t0.Id ASC), 
    null, 
    Func<QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator, Event>, 
    Eventify.Data.AppDbContext, 
    False, 
    False, 
    True
)'

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

        FROM 
        (
            SELECT e.Id, e.Date, e.Location, e.Name
            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Name DESC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        LEFT JOIN 
        (
            SELECT a.Id, a.EventId, a.IsAttending, a.UserId, u.Id AS Id0, u.Email, u.Password, u.Role, u.Username
            FROM Attendances AS a
            INNER JOIN Users AS u ON a.UserId == u.Id
        ) AS t0 ON t.Id == t0.EventId
        ORDER BY t.Name DESC, t.Id ASC, t0.Id ASC),

) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]

        FROM 
        (
            SELECT e.Id, e.Date, e.Location, e.Name
            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Name ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        LEFT JOIN 
        (
            SELECT a.Id, a.EventId, a.IsAttending, a.UserId, u.Id AS Id0, u.Email, u.Password, u.Role, u.Username
            FROM Attendances AS a
            INNER JOIN Users AS u ON a.UserId == u.Id
        ) AS t0 ON t.Id == t0.EventId
        ORDER BY t.Name ASC, t.Id ASC, t0.Id ASC),

) AS [t]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Name] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Name] DESC, [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

2025-05-30 12:17:40.884 +03:00 [DBG] Generated query execution expression: 
'queryContext => new SingleQueryingEnumerable<Attendance>(
    (RelationalQueryContext)queryContext, 
    RelationalCommandCache.QueryExpression(
        Client Projections:
            0 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: Attendance.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 0], [Property: Attendance.EventId (int) Required FK Index, 1], [Property: Attendance.IsAttending (bool) Required, 2], [Property: Attendance.UserId (int) Required FK Index, 3] }
            1 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: Event.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 4], [Property: Event.Date (DateTime) Required, 5], [Property: Event.Location (string) Required MaxLength(50), 6], [Property: Event.Name (string) Required MaxLength(50), 7] }
            2 -> Dictionary<IProperty, int> { [Property: User.Id (int) Required PK AfterSave:Throw ValueGenerated.OnAdd, 8], [Property: User.Email (string) Required MaxLength(50), 9], [Property: User.Password (string) Required MaxLength(50), 10], [Property: User.Role (string) Required MaxLength(50), 11], [Property: User.Username (string) Required MaxLength(50), 12] }
        SELECT t.Id, t.EventId, t.IsAttending, t.UserId, e.Id, e.Date, e.Location, e.Name, u.Id, u.Email, u.Password, u.Role, u.Username
        FROM 
        (
            SELECT a.Id, a.EventId, a.IsAttending, a.UserId
            FROM Attendances AS a
            ORDER BY a.Id DESC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        INNER JOIN Events AS e ON t.EventId == e.Id
        INNER JOIN Users AS u ON t.UserId == u.Id
        ORDER BY t.Id DESC), 
    null, 
    Func<QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator, Attendance>, 
    Eventify.Data.AppDbContext, 
    False, 
    False, 
    True

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[EventId], [t].[IsAttending], [t].[UserId], [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name], [u].[Id], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    ORDER BY [a].[Id] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Events] AS [e] ON [t].[EventId] = [e].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Id] DESC

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[EventId], [t].[IsAttending], [t].[UserId], [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name], [u].[Id], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    ORDER BY [a].[Id] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Events] AS [e] ON [t].[EventId] = [e].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Id] DESC

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[EventId], [t].[IsAttending], [t].[UserId], [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name], [u].[Id], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    ORDER BY [a].[Id] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Events] AS [e] ON [t].[EventId] = [e].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [t].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Id] DESC

            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Id ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        LEFT JOIN 
        (
            SELECT a.Id, a.EventId, a.IsAttending, a.UserId, u.Id AS Id0, u.Email, u.Password, u.Role, u.Username
            FROM Attendances AS a
            INNER JOIN Users AS u ON a.UserId == u.Id
        ) AS t0 ON t.Id == t0.EventId
        ORDER BY t.Id ASC, t0.Id ASC),

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
